articles.title: F1 all clear for Monaco GP as staff allowed back into Imola track - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Essential Formula 1 personnel have been allowed back into the Imola circuit on Thursday to help pack down and get ready to ship equipment to the next race in Monaco.
articles.content:
Following concerns about the Autodromo Enzo e Dino Ferrari being flooded by the swollen Santerno river, authorities had barred anyone from F1 entering the circuit from Tuesday afternoon.

articles.description: Chromosome analysis resolves debate about sister group of all animals. It's comb jellies, not sponges. Researchers used a novel chromosome-based approach to reveal that comb jellies were the first lineage to diverge from the animal tree of life, preceding spo…
articles.content:
ByUniversity of California - BerkeleyMay 18, 2023

articles.title: Human-evolution story rewritten by new data and computing power - Nature.com
articles.description: Humans did not emerge from a single region of Africa, suggests a study. Rather, our ancestors moved and intermingled for millennia.

articles.title: Regular Exercise Linked to Lower Parkinson’s Risk - Neuroscience News
articles.description: Regular physical activity, from cycling and walking to gardening and household chores, may reduce the risk of developing Parkinson’s disease.
